Text:
"The Infinity Trilogy comprises three absolutely fantastic (in both story and art) Marvel crossover events"

Haha - are you kidding me? Gauntlet was bearable but War and especially Crusade were supreme piles of shit.
thank u for expressing ur negativity with such eloquence, mrclscn; and i hopes u feels better soonest.  "to each his own."
Considering how good you are at finding limited series, how about trying to find the Marvel 5-part series called Heralds?
